title: OFFICIAL HANDBOOK OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE A TO Z VOL. 5 TPB (Trade Paperback)
description: AT LAST! The landmark encyclopedia-style OFFICIAL HANDBOOK OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE hardcover series finally is reprinted in softcover format! Each volume has corrected any errors in all profiles - and features a new, 16-page Where Are They Now?" update addendum with text and art! An indispensable resource for all true Marvel fans! VOL. 5 spotlights hundreds of characters beginning with G-J - including the Hand,  the Hellfire Club,  Heroes for Hire,  the High Evolutionary,  Ikaris,  Immortus,  the Infinity Gems,  the Inhumans,  the Initiative,  Jack of Hearts and the Jackal!
